name: Continual Flame
description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs from an object you touch. The flame looks normal but creates no heat and does not consume oxygen. It can be covered or quenched like a normal flame. The spell ends if dispelled.

components.materialDescription: ruby dust worth 50 gp, sprinkled on the flame

effects.description: Creates a heatless, oxygen-free flame on an object, shedding torch-like light until dispelled.
